ai-patthana21.30:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.30:0.3_0: under the inner skin of the flesh,
ai-patthana21.30:1.1_0: or deceitfulness arises in someone with the principles, without a cause,
ai-patthana21.30:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.30:2.1_0: or lacking in regard to fact,
ai-patthana21.30:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.30:3.1_0: or cause he does not give up a teaching with no cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.30:3.1_1: not cause or reason why the teaching doesn’t give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.30:3.1_2: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.30:3.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
